mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_notice_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from tbl_notice_reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno asc
